categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The male human known as the Cyber-Baron was a member of the Noble Court of the Anoat sector. He came from a line of technically-inclined aristocrats. At the time of the Galactic Empire's Iron Blockade, the Cyber-Baron joined the crew of a young smuggler.
In the 2015 iOS video game Star Wars: Uprising, the Cyber-Baron is one of the many crew members that can be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
